caption:
AI is a revolutionary tool, but it’s only half of the picture. While AI is helping the 🧑‍🔬humans🧑‍🔬 at Bayer, it’s their human touch that makes the biggest impact. By bringing together Life Sciences and AI, we could give farmers access to a new crop protection solution faster than ever before. 
 
Helping farmers stop pests in their tracks, means farmers can protect their crops while promoting food security, affordability and the health of our planet.
